name: microdrop-3.0
description: Microdrop with MQTT support and Web UI

scripts.build-all-dev-unix: npm run-script install-all && find ./packages -mindepth 1 -maxdepth 1 -type d -exec npm --prefix {} run-script build-dev \;
scripts.build-all-windows: @powershell -NoProfile -ExecutionPolicy unrestricted -Command " Get-ChildItem .\packages\* | Foreach { npm --prefix $_.fullname run-script build } "
@powershell -NoProfile -ExecutionPolicy unrestricted -Command " Get-ChildItem .\packages\* | Foreach { npm --prefix $_.fullname run-script build-dev } "
scripts.link-all-unix: find ./packages -mindepth 1 -maxdepth 1 -type d -exec sh -c "cd {} ; npm run-script link-packages" \;
scripts.link-all-windows: @powershell -NoProfile -ExecutionPolicy unrestricted -Command " Get-ChildItem .\packages\* | Foreach { cd $_.fullname ; npm run-script link-packages } "

author: Lucas Zeer
